text: Wiley Post returned to Floyd Bennett Field in Brooklyn, New York, 7 days, 18 hours, 49 minutes after leaving, becoming the fastest person to circumnavigate the Earth by air and the first to do it solo.

The first Mariner space probe to Venus had to be destroyed shortly after lift-off because of "improper operation of the Atlas airborne beacon equipment." The error was caused by a missing overbar in the program that must have disappeared during hand transcription.
Apple announced OS 8 for Macintosh computers. It added easier Internet integration and a 3D look to the OS.
